name: Generator
description:
Generator


Generator is a lightweight plugin that generates designs for print based on a CSV file. 


How it Works


Generator takes in the Layer names of both the Design Layer and the Text Layer. 


It generates duplicates of the Design Layer, replacing the contents of the text layers having the same names as the variables given in the CSV data.


Basic Usage


 1. Enter the name of the Layer to be replicated, along with that of the text layer containing the CSV Data.

 2. Choose the variables to be replaced

 3. Generate!


Naming Conventions


For Layer Variables

The layers to be modified should named in the format

'#VARIABLENAME'


ie. If the name of the CSV Header is 'NAME', the layers should be named in the format '#NAME'


For Inline Variables

The text content should contain the variable(s) in the format

'#{VARIABLENAME}'


ie. If the name of the CSV Header is 'NAME', the content of the text layer should contain a substring of the format '#{NAME}'

 

Got more ideas?
